About me

I’m just a rando on the internet doing my best to enjoy the absurdity of life.

Trying to do way too many things at once and looking like a clown in the process. Mainly focused on making games, streaming and other creative stuff - we’ll see how much of it ends up here but I’m probably going to stick to gamedev.
